diaGrabber.source.libreOfficeCalc¶

class diaGrabber.source.libreOfficeCalc.libreOfficeCalc(ODS_file_name, sheet_name_or_number, data_type='unknown', print_error_when_cell_is_empty=False)[source]¶

Bases: diaGrabber.source._source.source

allow to read values from a libre/open-office-calc document prepare for reading values from an libreOffice-calc-document needs: * ODS_file_name = “name of the file” e.g. “myfile.ods” * sheet_name_or_number =”name” OR number of the sheet e.g. “sheet1” OR 4

basisDimension(name, resolution, cell_range, includeMethod='')¶

diaGrabber.source._dimension.basisDimension

needs:

  • cell_range = “START:STOP” e.g. “C2:C1000”
  • it’s also possible to scan multiple collums... just type e.g. “A1:E10”
